meanings.sent1: In a crowded city, the anonymity of wearing a mask made me feel invisible.
meanings.sent2: Online, many people enjoy the anonymity of using a username instead of their real name.
meanings.sent3: The anonymity of the mysterious gift-giver at the office party sparked curiosity among colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The author's use of a pen name allowed for the anonymity needed to write freely.
meanings.sent5: The cloak of anonymity provided by the internet can sometimes lead to unkind behavior.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unknown or unacknowledged.
meanings.sent1: The anonymity of the masked singer on TV kept viewers guessing about their identity.
meanings.sent2: The anonymity of the donor's contribution to the charity event was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent3: The anonymity of the graffiti artist added an element of mystery to the city streets.
meanings.sent4: The small town offered a sense of anonymity where everyone knew each other's business.
meanings.sent5: The anonymity of the whistleblower was crucial to protect them from retaliation.
